short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that will give you randomly selected motivational quotes referenced from video games and RPGs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimalist way to open new tabs for video game enthusiasts. You'll be greeted by a random quote from an assortment of games to ponder life over. Whether you're trying to study, or simply looking something up, this new tab can invigorate you with a deep or motivational message!

Version 0.2
 - Added a randomly selected main title that references video game protagonists
 - Added local weather based on user location
 - Added randomly selected backgrounds

Features:
 - Easy to read clock interface
 - Random quotes to brighten your day
 - Very simple, minimalist, and not distracting
 - Weather information
 - Randomly selected backgrounds

Planned:
 - Todo List/Note taking area
 - Custom graphics for UI
